resources.string: Please upload a copy of your ID and proof of income for validation by the agent.
Please attach any supporting documents relevant to the issue being reported.

Date: October 20, 2025

Introduction
Welcome to RentWise. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use the app.

1. Information We Collect
‚Ä¢ Personal details: name, email, phone number, and profile photo.
‚Ä¢ Rental activity: listings you view, save, or book.
‚Ä¢ Optional location data (only with permission) to improve search relevance.

2. How We Use Your Information
We use your information to:
‚Ä¢ Manage your account and facilitate bookings.
‚Ä¢ Improve the quality and reliability of our services.
‚Ä¢ Send you booking updates and notifications you‚Äôve opted into.

3. Data Security
We use secure servers and encryption (including AES-256) to protect your data and follow best practices to prevent unauthorized access.

4. Sharing Your Information
We do not sell your data. We share limited data only with:
‚Ä¢ Property owners/managers (to enable booking logistics).
‚Ä¢ Trusted service providers (e.g., payments, maintenance) under strict obligations.

5. Your Rights
You can update or delete your information in the app at any time. If you uninstall the app, locally stored data (tokens, preferences) is cleared automatically.

6. Contact Us
For questions or concerns:
üìß support@rentwise.com
üåê www.rentwise.com/privacy

Last Updated: October 20, 2025
RentWise helps tenants and landlords manage listings, inquiries, bookings, maintenance, and communication in one simple app.
Tracking updates are refreshed in real-time. If an update takes longer than expected, please contact our support team.
